content: [{"season":3,"number":1,"title":"The Calm","ids":{"trakt":74804,"tvdb":4917397,"imdb":"tt3532626","tmdb":1000643,"tvrage":1065582554},"number_abs":null,"overview":"With crime in Starling City at an all-time low, Oliver thinks he can finally balance being both the Arrow and Oliver Queen and asks Felicity out on a date. Diggle becomes a father, Lance is promoted to Captain, Laurel joins Arrow’s inner circle and Felicity gets a part-time job at a tech store to make ends meet. Oliver fights to regain his company, Queen Consolidated, but comes up against a very worthy opponent – the charming Ray Palmer.","first_aired":"2014-10-08T17:00:00.000-07:00","updated_at":"2015-01-11T13:29:36.000-08:00","rating":8.31309,"votes":1910,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/804/screenshots/original/32d79a2e43.jpg?1420875818","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/804/screenshots/medium/32d79a2e43.jpg?1420875818","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/804/screenshots/thumb/32d79a2e43.jpg?1420875818"}}},{"season":3,"number":2,"title":"Sara","ids":{"trakt":74805,"tvdb":4936768,"imdb":"tt3856758","tmdb":1001380,"tvrage":1065594604},"number_abs":null,"overview":"Lance calls the Arrow when another archer appears in town and starts skewering businessmen. Diggle uses A.R.G.U.S. to find the archer’s identity; he is a man named Simon Lacroix, who goes by the codename Komodo. However, the team hits a rough patch with the mission and gets help from a surprising source – Laurel. Meanwhile, Oliver begins to worry that he hasn’t heard from Thea, which forces Roy to tell him the truth about why she left town. Ray Palmer pursues Felicity. In the flashback, Maseo tells Oliver that Amanda Waller has ordered his first kill. As Oliver looks down the scope of the rifle, he sees the target is his best friend, Tommy. Despite her promise to her sister, Laurel debates sharing a secret about Sara with Lance.","first_aired":"2014-10-15T17:00:00.000-07:00","updated_at":"2015-01-11T13:29:37.000-08:00","rating":8.13258,"votes":1682,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/805/screenshots/original/03ae875861.jpg?1420875818","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/805/screenshots/medium/03ae875861.jpg?1420875818","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/805/screenshots/thumb/03ae875861.jpg?1420875818"}}},{"season":3,"number":3,"title":"Corto Maltese","ids":{"trakt":74806,"tvdb":4936769,"imdb":"tt3879318","tmdb":1005647,"tvrage":1065594605},"number_abs":null,"overview":"Oliver decides it’s time for Thea to come back to Starling City, so he packs for Corto Maltese, where Felicity has traced Thea’s whereabouts. Lyla asks Diggle to go with Oliver because one of her field operatives, Mark Shaw, has gone dark in Corto Maltese and she’d like him to look into it. Feeling responsible for Thea’s departure, Roy joins Oliver and Diggle on their journey. Shaw double-crosses Diggle, putting numerous A.R.G.U.S. agents, including Lyla, at risk. Meanwhile, Laurel meets Ted Grant, and Felicity adjusts to her new job.","first_aired":"2014-10-22T17:00:00.000-07:00","updated_at":"2015-01-11T13:27:29.000-08:00","rating":8.16305,"votes":1613,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/806/screenshots/original/8bbfe3b56e.jpg?1420875819","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/806/screenshots/medium/8bbfe3b56e.jpg?1420875819","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/806/screenshots/thumb/8bbfe3b56e.jpg?1420875819"}}},{"season":3,"number":4,"title":"The Magician","ids":{"trakt":74807,"tvdb":4962678,"imdb":"tt3919146","tmdb":1005648,"tvrage":1065644668},"number_abs":null,"overview":"A furious Nyssa confronts Oliver about Sara, then join forces against the Dark Archer, intent on bringing the killer to justice. Laurel keeps her distance from Nyssa. Oliver and Roy work on repairing their respective relationships with Thea, who has returned home. Nyssa discusses Oliver with her father.","first_aired":"2014-10-29T17:00:00.000-07:00","updated_at":"2015-01-11T13:29:29.000-08:00","rating":8.1725,"votes":1571,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/807/screenshots/original/b0f9c36a91.jpg?1420875820","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/807/screenshots/medium/b0f9c36a91.jpg?1420875820","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/807/screenshots/thumb/b0f9c36a91.jpg?1420875820"}}},{"season":3,"number":5,"title":"The Secret Origin of Felicity Smoak","ids":{"trakt":74808,"tvdb":4962679,"imdb":"tt3956512","tmdb":1005649,"tvrage":1065670765},"number_abs":null,"overview":"When a cyber attack brings Starling City to its knees, Oliver and Felicity are pushed to their limits to contain the destruction. Life gets even more complicated for Felicity when her mother, Donna, stops by for a surprise visit. Ted questions Laurel’s motives. Thea buys an apartment with Malcolm’s 'estate' money.","first_aired":"2014-11-05T17:00:00.000-08:00","updated_at":"2015-01-11T13:25:43.000-08:00","rating":8.35422,"votes":1612,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/808/screenshots/original/10661a1966.jpg?1420875820","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/808/screenshots/medium/10661a1966.jpg?1420875820","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/074/808/screenshots/thumb/10661a1966.jpg?1420875820"}}},{"season":3,"number":6,"title":"Guilty","ids":{"trakt":998789,"tvdb":5023466,"imdb":"tt4006586","tmdb":1010735,"tvrage":1065670766},"number_abs":null,"overview":"After a body is found strung up in the Wildcat gym, Ted becomes the main suspect. Oliver and Laurel argue over Ted’s innocence. When Maseo needs Oliver to remember where an informant for China White stashed key information, he asks Tatsu to help jog Oliver’s memory. Roy shares a secret with Felicity.","first_aired":"2014-11-12T17:00:00.000-08:00","updated_at":"2015-01-11T13:29:49.000-08:00","rating":8.08283,"votes":1485,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/789/screenshots/original/bd4896f84d.jpg?1420875821","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/789/screenshots/medium/bd4896f84d.jpg?1420875821","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/789/screenshots/thumb/bd4896f84d.jpg?1420875821"}}},{"season":3,"number":7,"title":"Draw Back Your Bow","ids":{"trakt":998804,"tvdb":5033874,"imdb":"tt4006576","tmdb":1010736,"tvrage":1065670767},"number_abs":null,"overview":"Oliver must stop an Arrow-obsessed serial killer, Carrie Cutter, who is convinced that The Arrow is her one true love and will stop at nothing to get his attention. Unfortunately, her way of getting his attention is to kill people. Meanwhile, Ray asks Felicity to be his date for a work dinner with important clients. Thea auditions new DJs for Verdant and meets Chase, a brash DJ with whom she immediately clashes.","first_aired":"2014-11-19T17:00:00.000-08:00","updated_at":"2015-01-11T13:26:40.000-08:00","rating":8.0485,"votes":1464,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/804/screenshots/original/fd30e2c327.jpg?1420875821","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/804/screenshots/medium/fd30e2c327.jpg?1420875821","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/804/screenshots/thumb/fd30e2c327.jpg?1420875821"}}},{"season":3,"number":8,"title":"The Brave and the Bold (2)","ids":{"trakt":998807,"tvdb":5042002,"imdb":"tt4006578","tmdb":1010737,"tvrage":1065710734},"number_abs":null,"overview":"A crossover event that began on \"The Flash\" concludes with Oliver teaming with the Flash to stop a boomerang-wielding killer who plants five bombs in the city that are set to explode at the same time.","first_aired":"2014-12-03T17:00:00.000-08:00","updated_at":"2015-01-11T13:29:33.000-08:00","rating":8.53746,"votes":1455,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/807/screenshots/original/89734fcc2e.jpg?1420886762","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/807/screenshots/medium/89734fcc2e.jpg?1420886762","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/807/screenshots/thumb/89734fcc2e.jpg?1420886762"}}},{"season":3,"number":9,"title":"The Climb","ids":{"trakt":998810,"tvdb":5042004,"imdb":"tt4006548","tmdb":1018202,"tvrage":1065710735},"number_abs":null,"overview":"Nyssa returns to Starling City and tells Oliver that her father, Ra’s al Ghul has given Oliver 48 hours to find Sara’s killer or the League of Assassins will start killing the citizens of Starling City. Laurel is stunned when her father delivers a very special Christmas gift – her mother, Dinah. Meanwhile, Ray tries to make amends with Felicity and Oliver sets a meeting with Ra’s al Ghul.","first_aired":"2014-12-10T17:00:00.000-08:00","updated_at":"2015-01-11T13:28:57.000-08:00","rating":8.80612,"votes":1341,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/810/screenshots/original/80ce5a5e5b.jpg?1420875826","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/810/screenshots/medium/80ce5a5e5b.jpg?1420875826","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/810/screenshots/thumb/80ce5a5e5b.jpg?1420875826"}}},{"season":3,"number":10,"title":"Left Behind","ids":{"trakt":998817,"tvdb":5042005,"imdb":"tt4006582","tmdb":1019251,"tvrage":1065728382},"number_abs":null,"overview":"In the aftermath of Oliver’s fight with Ra’s al Ghul, Diggle and Arsenal continue to protect the city in the Arrow’s absence. However, after three days without hearing from Oliver, they begin to fear the worst may have happened to their friend. Felicity refuses to believe that Oliver could be dead until Merlyn pays the team a surprise visit. Thea suspects there is something more behind Oliver’s disappearance and asks Merlyn for a favor. Meanwhile, Ray tests a part of his new suit and Laurel takes up the mantle of the Black Canary.","first_aired":"2015-01-21T17:00:00.000-08:00","updated_at":"2015-01-11T07:31:32.000-08:00","rating":9.17308,"votes":52,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/817/screenshots/original/a464a090d6.jpg?1420306107","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/817/screenshots/medium/a464a090d6.jpg?1420306107","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/episodes/000/998/817/screenshots/thumb/a464a090d6.jpg?1420306107"}}},{"season":3,"number":11,"title":"Midnight City","ids":{"trakt":1446376,"tvdb":5042007,"imdb":"tt4006570","tmdb":1030773,"tvrage":null},"number_abs":null,"overview":"Arsenal and Diggle confront Laurel about trying to step into her sister’s shoes and warn her to stop before she gets herself killed. However, when Brick kidnaps the city’s Aldermen and threatens to kill them all unless the police evacuate The Glades, it’s all suits on deck. Meanwhile, Ray steps in to help Lance and the police force fight Brick, showing Felicity a new side of her boss. Malcom tells Thea that Ra’s al Ghul is after him and his family and they must leave town immediately.","first_aired":"2015-01-28T17:00:00.000-08:00","updated_at":"2015-01-10T19:00:07.000-08:00","rating":10.0,"votes":1,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":null,"medium":null,"thumb":null}}},{"season":3,"number":12,"title":"Uprising","ids":{"trakt":1446381,"tvdb":5045999,"imdb":"tt4006574","tmdb":1030774,"tvrage":null},"number_abs":null,"overview":null,"first_aired":"2015-02-04T17:00:00.000-08:00","updated_at":"2015-01-03T09:28:28.000-08:00","rating":0.0,"votes":0,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":null,"medium":null,"thumb":null}}},{"season":3,"number":13,"title":"Canaries","ids":{"trakt":1446383,"tvdb":5054712,"imdb":null,"tmdb":null,"tvrage":null},"number_abs":null,"overview":null,"first_aired":null,"updated_at":"2015-01-03T09:28:28.000-08:00","rating":0.0,"votes":0,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":null,"medium":null,"thumb":null}}},{"season":3,"number":14,"title":"The Return","ids":{"trakt":1446384,"tvdb":5069023,"imdb":null,"tmdb":null,"tvrage":null},"number_abs":null,"overview":null,"first_aired":null,"updated_at":"2015-01-03T09:28:28.000-08:00","rating":0.0,"votes":0,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":null,"medium":null,"thumb":null}}},{"season":3,"number":15,"title":"Nanda Parbat","ids":{"trakt":1446395,"tvdb":5087485,"imdb":null,"tmdb":null,"tvrage":null},"number_abs":null,"overview":null,"first_aired":null,"updated_at":"2015-01-03T09:28:29.000-08:00","rating":0.0,"votes":0,"available_translations":[],"images":{"screenshot":{"full":null,"medium":null,"thumb":null}}}]
